summary:
Once asked by a friend of mine: "How would you describe yourself in an alphabetical way?"

So here is my A to G personality catalog:
Analytical | Boundless | Creative | Diligent | Enthusiastic | Flexible | Goal-oriented

Here is a brief explanation for it: 
- I possess good analytical skill, enjoy working with database with the ability to look at issues from a helicopter view. 
- I'm a type of person who perceives challenges as opportunities to grow and achieve great results.
- I love seeing the world around me from different perspectives with entrepreneurial mindset to turn dreams into great visions. 
- I'm a hardworking, enthusiastic and flexible person who can quickly adapt to unexpected changes happen in midway while pursuing the tasks without being discouraged to stop by continuously aiming at the goal to achieve.
- I'm passionate about giving advises to people in difficult situations as I believe that is the way I can learn from their experiences.

I have four years experience working as a Data Analyst supporting the operations accross Europe, and I'm now in transitioning to Data Science and Big Data Analytics. Skilled in Statistics, Programming, Data Visualization and Problem Solving, I'm passionate about using Data to solve business and social problems, extracting insights and recommendations to support decision-making and communicate results to different audiences combining analytical storytelling with development of actionable dashboards and reports. I thrive in multicultural, fast-pace and challenging environments. I have a BSc. degree in Logistics Management (Economics) from HAN University of Applied Science and currently pursuing a Master Degree in Data Science at European Leadership University.

Please don't hesitate to contact me directly (my number: +31 (0)63 934 5739, email: binhduongnguyen2811@gmail.com, or send me InMail) if you know that we share a match in our interests. I look forward to hearing from you!

treasury_media.description: In addition to the elementary Dutch language course I have taken at my university during my first year, I go for extra mile by completing the Dutch language course offered by Duolingo online. I believe being able to communicate in Dutch would become my extra strong point and help me to better integrate into the Dutch society. Finally, I have successfully accomplished this since I truly enjoy learning a new language and exploring a new cultural dimension everyday

projects.title: H&M Netherlands' Supply Chain Analysis and Improvement
projects.description:
This in-depth case study on H&M Netherlands' Supply Chain team is designed to comprehensively describe, understand H&M's Business Process and analyse potential root causes for the current issues of late and incomplete deliveries to their retailers that the client encounters with.
On the basis of the analysis, various alternative solutions will be drawn out with regard to the Supply Chain Operations Reference (SCOR) framework and will be considered carefully according to the cost/benefit analysis for each solution. Consequently, the best practical solutions will be chosen and the final recommendation will be given to the client via an academic report.

contributors.headline: Control Tower Team Lead - Key Account Management Team, Import

projects.title: Logistics Policy Plan - Setting up Marketing & Distribution plan for P&G's products to enter a new South America market
projects.description: This project first aims at figuring out the best combination between a certain P&G's product line and a new market for that product line in South America by replicating P&G's competitive strategies in expanding into a new market and conducting an all-inclusive country-filter analysis. Afterward, with that perfect match, the team then develops respective marketing and distribution plan as well as sketches out detailed financial considerations for those plans to arrive at the final conclusions and recommendations toward P&G via an academic report

projects.title: P&G Canada - DayQuil Sampling Operations Project
projects.description: Research appropriate methodologies & concepts for a critical review of the organization of the Project case study and also the utility of these concepts. Then construct a Project plan dossier for the project showing how it should have been delivered more successfully.

contributors.headline: Graduation Student at DPD Nederland BV

projects.title: Passenger Public Transportation Project
projects.description: Discuss the ways with which public transport operators can make their services more attractive to road users and thus increase the demand for them, taken examples particularly in the UK.

contributors.headline: Graduation Student at DPD Nederland BV

projects.title: Foreign Direct Investment Project
projects.description: Accessing the feasibility and weighting Trade-offs vs. Benefits for the FDI project from an agricultural equipment manufacturer (AgriFact) from the Netherlands to China. The project deepens our understanding of how various factors could have effect on a particular FDI project, including exchange rate differential, macro-economic policies and the market nature, and methods to examine how beneficial economically the project eventually.

projects.title: Integrated Logistical Concepts Project
projects.description: Applying the Integrated Logistical Concepts to propose recommendations to HomeAir B.V. on their current situation so that all logistics operational departments will work align with the general business objectives and strategic goals.

contributors.headline: MS Project Management Specialist at Vinted

projects.title: Material Management Project
projects.description:
By analyzing an outdoor leisure products company on its current operational process and organizational structure (both external and internal), a feasible solution to improve the process and enhance the cooperation with suppliers, dealers and private customers was given.
We have acquired a profound basis on material planning and flow of goods controlling with this typical case study encompassing all operational stages within a company.

contributors.headline: Control Tower Team Lead - Key Account Management Team, Import
Graduation Student at DPD Nederland BV

projects.title: Quantitative Research Project
projects.description: We construct a questionnaire for our technical service client on the overall customers satisfaction for their responses then use the SPSS tools to analyze the database and project the result onto the broader population with statistical confidence. This project helps us to know in-depth of how the analytical works and how to meaningful conclusion from the database.

projects.title: Warehouse Layout & Design Project
projects.description:
Writing the advisory report on the optimal warehouse layout and design for a fictional spare parts company. The report includes:
•	Activity/ Product/ Order Profiling
•	Design and description of inbound operations, storage strategy, stock accuracy strategy, and outbound operations 
•	Systematic warehouse planning
•	Advice on performance planning
This project provides us with thorough knowledge and skills of how to analyze a set of operational factors and to set-up a new warehouse successfully to fulfill the demand.

contributors.headline: Control Tower Team Lead - Key Account Management Team, Import
Bachelor of Logistics Management and Economics

projects.title: Business Management Game
projects.description: A group of 2nd year students in Arnhem Business School coming from various cultural backgrounds and business specialized area (Business Management, Finance, Communication, Human Resources studies) cooperated with each other in a stimulate business management game which took place over 3 days with 10 rounds. A set of database, rules and guidelines were given at the initials, which we had to analyze and made intelligent/solid business operations knowledge based decisions by forecasting what market situation will be in the next round. Worked alongside with us were tutors who helped us in clarifying information in the first few rounds and only gave advice to us on request afterwards.

projects.title: Operartional Plan
projects.description:
- Appointed as Logistics Manager of a consultancy agent
- Write an individual (final) Logistics Report
- Adjust the individual report to make up the final group report
- Deal with logistics issues with consulted company

projects.title: Business Plan
projects.description:
Working with students from different cultural backgrounds to co-create "Cleansy" - an automated body-washing machine specially designed for elderly and disabled people.Our group was selected as one of the best five groups out of 40 groups and won the final prize.
The project process including following steps:
- Come up with an idea of a new, innovative product.
- Write a Marketing plan to introduce that product to the Netherlands market.
- Finalize the Financial plan to ensure the product profitability.
- Write a report for both the Marketing plan and Financial plan.
- Present the whole project before the Assessment Board.

- Design customized, insightful and action-driven data solutions for key decision makers

- Development embracing SAFe framework
profile_positions.title: Associate Data Analyst, Information Services, Europe

profile_positions.description:
Thanks to the convincing and comprehensive proposal for purchasing pallets across Europe toward PPG Industries during my internship, I am retained to execute this project in practical operations.

In about two months, with collaboration from local teams, I have drawn up detailed proposals of sourcing options for three plants with highest pallet spend value in the Netherlands and UK.
profile_positions.title: Interim Support Buyer (Pallet Project)

profile_positions.description:
- Strategic Procurement Project for Pallets & Carton Boxes Categories, European scope
- Potential savings from implementing new sourcing strategies, according to data analysis, is of 25% of the current annual spend (approximately €2.2 million)
- The project results was evaluated as outstanding by the management board, especially for the level of details in data analyses and actionable plans as conclusions.
- The project is to be implemented from July 2018
profile_positions.title: Graduation Internship

profile_positions.description: I'm the Representative for Logistics Management (Economic) students attending 2013 - 2017 at Arnhem Business School
profile_positions.title: Course Representative

profile_positions.description: I took the initiative to become a representative for my subject area stream - Logistics Management (Economics) study at Arnhem Business School Open Days/Evenings since the beginning of my 2nd year. My role is to introduce to prospective students, who nearly finish their high school education and are looking for a suitable university and major to pursue their dream, on general information about the school, why they should choose Arnhem Business School over other universities, advise them for the best-fit undergraduate program offered at the university to their interests and answers all their questions. Overall the goal is to convince them to study at Arnhem Business School with 4 English-taught Business Management majors and help them to have general ideas about student life here. During the academic year 2014 - 2015, four Open Days/ Evenings have been organized successfully. Further in the academic year 2015 - 2016, the team brings the organization of Open Days/Evenings to a higher level by connecting prospective students with 3rd year ABS students participated in the Exchange Program in other countries.
profile_positions.title: Arnhem Business School Promotion Team Member

profile_positions.description: I'm in charged of coaching first year students in an international context to help themselves get acquainted with the new environment of our business school, the Holland culture and to be able to strive in that new environment which will be there second home. In order to qualify for this role, volunteers are required to attend the mentor training course which enrich not only their inter-cultural management skills but also coaching skill and other basic social skills.
profile_positions.title: International First Year Students Personal Mentor

profile_positions.description:
Within the Supply Chain Finance (SCF) project for SMEs established by the Kennis DC Logistiek, I work as a Researcher Assistant for the following assignments:
1) Developing a Theoretical Framework for the project by leveraging existing research papers about SCF topic, primarily from the SCF community and Kennis DC Logistiek.
2) Providing recommendations to the SMEs within the scope of the project of how they can apply various SCF instruments in their operations according to the framework.
profile_positions.title: Research Internship in the Supply Chain Finance project for SMEs

profile_positions.description: Asean-European Trading Marine Co., Ltd is a trading company with its headquarter in Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam and specializes in importing MRO tools and equipment for clients in marine and petroleum industry as well as high-tech devices (PCs, Tablets,...) for ordinary consumer market in Viet Nam. My most recent project with them is to establish a collaboration between Á-Âu Trading Marine Ltd. with TrekStor GmbH - a well-known German OEM for electronic devices in European market and proceed in importing process to the promising Vietnamese market.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Partner

profile_positions.description:
Being in an official internship position, my weekly tasks are being responsible for planning and managing the deployment of transporting finished goods process from the company central warehouse in the Netherlands to the company's Country Business Units (CBU) in Czech and Slovakia, as well as handling all the related issues effectively.
Besides that, I am also involved in the Warehouse Capacity Planning project; of which the main objective is to develop a better understanding over the trend of the number of pallet spaces occupied in the warehouse along with those constraints in inventory control, then develop and refine the forecast tool to achieve a more accurate outlook of the capacity requirement in the future to accommodate the sales volume target.
profile_positions.title: Supply Planning - Deployment Planner & Projects Internship

company.name: Cat Lai Inland Central Depot - Saigon Newport Corporation

profile_positions.location: Cat Lai Port, Nguyen Thi Dinh, Cat Lai, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
profile_positions.company: Cat Lai Inland Central Depot - Saigon Newport Corporation
profile_positions.description:
The Technical Service Agent Jsc. was established exclusively for the purpose of ensuring technically smooth operation of Cat Lai Inland Central Depot and is responsible for executing all maintenance & repair services for the port.
Being a study intern about material management for the Technical Service Js. Agent at Cat Lai ICD - Saigon Newport, I am responsible for:
•	Proactively assisting the chief manager of the department in purchasing and managing the physical flow of equipment; which are used in maintenance and repair of those container trucks, lifts and cranes in the ICD; in and out of the warehouse. Ensuring stable flow and smooth port operation at all times. I received good remarks and constructive feedback about my performance from him.
•	Keeping track of all financial transactions with the suppliers of the equipment.
•	Supporting the warehouse management team in improving the existent system.
•	Assisting in preparing the monthly performance analysis report with concerns about inventory database & financial transactions cross-check, and the quality of technical service based on internal clients´ records
profile_positions.title: Study Internship, Material Management Assist. (Purchasing & Warehousing) Dept. for Technical Service
